comment:
* SystemTextClassifier specific information. *

* This contains information requires for the TextClassificationManagerService to process the * requests from the application, e.g. user id, calling package name and etc. Centrialize the data * into this class helps to extend the scalability if we want to add new fields. * @hide

variables.name: mCallingPackageName
variables.comment: The name of the package that sent the TC request.

variables.name: mUserId
variables.comment: The id of the user that sent the TC request.

variables.name: mUseDefaultTextClassifier
variables.comment: Whether to use the default text classifier to handle the request.

methods.name: public int getUserId()
methods.comment: * Returns the id of the user that sent the TC request.

methods.name: public String getCallingPackageName()
methods.comment:
* Returns the name of the package that sent the TC request.
     * This returns {@code null} if no calling package name is set.

methods.name: public boolean useDefaultTextClassifier()
methods.comment: * Returns whether to use the default text classifier to handle TC request.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
